name: Oasis Garden's Kindness
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  In the literature buried deep beneath the yellow sands, the Lord of Flowerswas the Mistress of Dreams.  She bestowed dreams upon the exiled, the manic, and the foolish. In thosedreams, they were presented with their dearest delights. Burdened by thebrutality of reality, they were fascinated by the charm of the Lord of Flowersand captivated by her beauty and care.
